author: nigel
msg: HADOOP-3041. Deprecate JobConf.setOutputPath and JobConf.getOutputPath. Deprecate OutputFormatBase. Add FileOutputFormat. Existing output formats extending OutputFormatBase, now extend FileOutputFormat. Add the following APIs in FileOutputFormat: setOutputPath, getOutputPath, getWorkOutputPath. Contributed by Amareshwari Sriramadasu.
